page.title: 06Sports and Leisure,Solihull
page.content: One of the most popular clubs in the area is{Blossomfield tennis, {football, cricket and hockey club. These sports are very popular with young and old. There is coaching available for all these sports and many competitions are run.{Solihull {football club}runs two teams, one for intermediate players and one for adults which plays in the local league.{Shirley Golf Club}is the only golf course in the area. Only members can play there but anyone can apply to join. At the{Gym and Slim club}on Oakenshaw Rd. you can do keep-fit and aerobics.It costs Â£2.50 to join. There is a sports hall at the{Sixth {Form College}where you can play squash among other things,and a {Municipal Sports Ground}on Widney Lane where one of the most popular sports is snooker.
